message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm really interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I understand that $250 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $225. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $225 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $175 for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I can offer it to you for $200. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really like the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $180 for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make sure I get a good deal. I can offer it to you for $190. It's a fair price, and I think you'll really like the product. What do you think?
I'm getting close to your price, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $185 for the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting close to your price, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $187.50. It's a fair price, and I think you'll really like the product. What do you think?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to pay $185 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
